summary: Provides a command‑line tool that runs a NeMo speech‑to‑text model on a dataset, generates hypothesis and reference transcription files, optionally applies a GLM mapping, calls the SCTK sclite utility, and captures the resulting evaluation scores.
business_intent: Enables researchers and developers to quickly evaluate ASR model accuracy using standard sclite metrics such as word error rate, facilitating model comparison and performance tracking.
